function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contaminated wastewater with pathogens","Impact":"Spread of diseases including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper hygiene and disinfection measures, surveillance and tracking of pathogens in wastewater","Technologies":"WBE surveillance, wastewater treatment plants, chlorination, ozonation, UV radiation, RT-qPCR assays","People":"Population in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities and water management authorities"},{"Description":"High demand for the health system and availability of intensive care","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems and inadequate care for COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Improvement of healthcare capacity, implementation of control measures for social protection and economic package","Technologies":"Healthcare system expansion, social protection measures, economic support","People":"Healthcare workers and COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Government health authorities, international organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate control measures of social protection and economic package","Impact":"Increased vulnerability in low-and middle-income countries (LMICs)","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective control measures for social protection and economic package","Technologies":"Economic support, social protection measures","People":"Vulnerable populations in LMICs","Owner":"Government authorities, international organizations"}]}
